verses.translation: In the name of Allah, the Most Compassionate, the Most Merciful
All praise be to Allah[1], the Lord[2] of the worlds[3],
the Most Compassionate, the Most Merciful[4],
Master[5] of the Day of Judgment.
You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help.
Guide us to the straight path,

verses.arabic_text: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غَيۡرِ ٱلۡمَغۡضُوبِ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.translation: the path of those whom You have blessed[6]; not of those who incurred Your Wrath[7], or of those who went astray[8].
